code: import React from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{addPostActionCreator}from'../../../redux/profile-reducer';import MyPosts from'./MyPosts';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{posts:state.profilePage.posts,newPostText:state.profilePage.newPostText};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{addPost:function addPost(post){dispatch(addPostActionCreator(post));}};};var MyPostsContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(MyPosts);export default MyPostsContainer;
